languages.text: {n}Все собравшиеся здесь при оружии, все украшены шрамами, а некоторые — и свежими ранами. Среди ксеносов вы замечаете и нескольких людей. Они голосят на смеси разных наречий, а в их смехе сквозят нотки безумия и кровожадности. Тягостное чувство смертной тоски витает в воздухе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Все собравшиеся здесь при оружии, все украшены шрамами, а некоторые — и свежими ранами. Среди ксеносов вы замечаете и нескольких людей. Они голосят на смеси разных наречий, а в их смехе сквозят нотки безумия и кровожадности. Тягостное чувство смертной тоски витает в воздухе.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Все собравшиеся здесь при оружии, все украшены шрамами, а некоторые — и свежими ранами. Среди ксеносов вы замечаете и нескольких людей. Они голосят на смеси разных наречий, а в их смехе сквозят нотки безумия и кровожадности. Тягостное чувство смертной тоски витает в воздухе.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}All who are gathered here are armed. Everyone bears scars, some also have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter bespeaks lunacy and bloodlust. A heavy sinking feeling hangs in the air.{/n}

{n}All who are gathered here are armed. Everyone bears scars, some also have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter bespeaks lunacy and bloodlust. A heavy sinking feeling hangs in the air.{/n}

{n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

{n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

{n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

languages.text: {n}房间里所有人都带着武器。每个人身上都有伤疤，有的人甚至还带着新伤。你注意到，这些异形之中有几个人类，他们用乱七八糟的语言哇啦哇啦地说着，笑声中充满了疯狂与对鲜血的渴望。空气中弥漫着一股末日已至的气氛。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}房间里所有人都带着武器。每个人身上都有伤疤，有的人甚至还带着新伤。你注意到，这些异形之中有几个人类，他们用乱七八糟的语言哇啦哇啦地说着，笑声中充满了疯狂与对鲜血的渴望。空气中弥漫着一股末日已至的气氛。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Todo el mundo reunido aquí está armado. Todo el mundo tiene cicatrices y algunos también heridas frescas. Ves a algunos humanos entre los xenos. Oyes el clamor de numerosas lenguas y risas dementes y sanguinarias. El aire está impregnado de un aire de condena.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Todo el mundo reunido aquí está armado. Todo el mundo tiene cicatrices y algunos también heridas frescas. Ves a algunos humanos entre los xenos. Oyes el clamor de numerosas lenguas y risas dementes y sanguinarias. El aire está impregnado de un aire de condena.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ここにいる者は皆、丸腰だ。全員に傷痕がついており、生傷のある者さえいる。異種族のなかに、何人か人間がいることに気が付いた。さまざまな言語が入り乱れて騒々しく、彼らの笑い声は狂気と血への渇望に満ちている。部屋の中は迫りくる破滅の雰囲気に包まれている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ここにいる者は皆、丸腰だ。全員に傷痕がついており、生傷のある者さえいる。異種族のなかに、何人か人間がいることに気が付いた。さまざまな言語が入り乱れて騒々しく、彼らの笑い声は狂気と血への渇望に満ちている。部屋の中は迫りくる破滅の雰囲気に包まれている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Alle, die hier versammelt sind, sind bewaffnet. Alle haben Narben, einige sogar frische Wunden. Du bemerkst unter den Xenos einige Menschen. Sie lärmen in einem Mischmasch aus verschiedenen Sprachen, ihr Gelächter ist voller Wahnsinn und Blutdurst. Eine dicke Atmosphäre des Untergangs hängt in der Luft.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Alle, die hier versammelt sind, sind bewaffnet. Alle haben Narben, einige sogar frische Wunden. Du bemerkst unter den Xenos einige Menschen. Sie lärmen in einem Mischmasch aus verschiedenen Sprachen, ihr Gelächter ist voller Wahnsinn und Blutdurst. Eine dicke Atmosphäre des Untergangs hängt in der Luft.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Toutes les personnes présentes sont armées et portent des cicatrices. Sur certaines, vous apercevez même des blessures encore fraîches. Parmi les xénos, vous remarquez quelques humains. Ils s'expriment bruyamment dans un mélange de langues, en laissant éclater des rires empreints de démence et de soif de sang. Il flotte dans l'air une sensation écrasante de malheur imminent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Toutes les personnes présentes sont armées et portent des cicatrices. Sur certaines, vous apercevez même des blessures encore fraîches. Parmi les xénos, vous remarquez quelques humains. Ils s'expriment bruyamment dans un mélange de langues, en laissant éclater des rires empreints de démence et de soif de sang. Il flotte dans l'air une sensation écrasante de malheur imminent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Odadaki herkes silahlı. Yaraları, hatta bazılarının taze cerihaları var. Zenoların arasında birkaç insan göze çarpıyor. Diller karmaşası içinde dönen sohbetten kana susamış, cinnete aç kahkahalar yükseliyor. Mekâna âdeta kıyamet havası hâkim.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Everyone gathered here is armed. They all bear scars, and some even have fresh wounds. You notice a few humans among the xenos. They clamour in a mishmash of tongues, and their laughter rings with lunacy and bloodlust. The air is thick with an all-pervading sense of doom.{/n}
